Tailscale.description:
Zero config VPN using WireGuard. Access your devices securely from anywhere.

Note: uses host networking with privileged network access.

Requires the generation of a tailnet Auth Key: via Tailscale Settings->Keys

Based on the official stable docker image: https://hub.docker.com/r/tailscale/tailscale, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.
Tailscale.more_info:
Default Key Expiry is 180 days. Temporary extension possible.

Web interface enable as root docker exec tailscaled tailscale web
